title: Regal Emerald and Diamond Kundan Haaram - Lakshmi Collection
materials: White Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones with Hyderabadi Polish. The gold is meticulously crafted to showcase the radiance of the stones.
features: Intricately designed Kundan setting showcasing traditional floral and paisley motifs. The necklace features a layered crescent design adorned with cascading gold ball drops. The pendant features a larger, prominent emerald surrounded by an elaborate Kundan work. The entire piece exudes a vintage charm with a modern edge.
colors: White (CZ diamonds). The combination is a timeless classic in South Indian jewelry.
occasions: and traditional Telugu ceremonies like Seemantham or half-saree function (Voni function). A perfect heirloom piece for generations to come.
description: This Haaram beautifully marries traditional Kundan craftsmanship with modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality Kundan stones and emeralds ensures a lasting brilliance. A statement piece that reflects the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad and Southern India.
